fr.umlv.yourobot.context

Interface WorldSet


  • public interface WorldSet
    Represent a set of world playable. License: GNU Public license v3.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      World getNextWorld()
      Gets the next world of the set of world.
      World getReplayWorld()
      Get the current world in order to be replayed.
      boolean hasMoreWorld()
      Returns true if there is one or more worlds.
      void newGame()
      Reset the worldSet in order to restart a new game.

    • Method Detail

      • getNextWorld

        World getNextWorld()
        Gets the next world of the set of world.
        Returns:
        A World or null if the end of the game is reached.

      • getReplayWorld

        World getReplayWorld()
        Get the current world in order to be replayed.
        Returns:
        The world to be played.

      • hasMoreWorld

        boolean hasMoreWorld()
        Returns true if there is one or more worlds.
        Returns:
        True if more worlds, false otherwise.

      • newGame

        void newGame()
        Reset the worldSet in order to restart a new game.
